head.title: Michelle & Michael | Dana Marino Design
head.description: A full wedding stationery collection for a Marco Island wedding, featuring a classic meets contemporary style, with hits of silver foil for shine.

body.name: Michelle & Michael
body.description: A full wedding stationery collection featuring a classic meets contemporary style, with hits of silver foil for shine. The cool greys and touches of fuschia reflected the couple's modern taste, which was continued throughout the event's floral and decorative details. Featured on Style Me Pretty and in The Knot Florida Magazine.
